External dependencies

There is only "one" dependency - Boost C++ libraries.

Strictly speacking, CLPP use following libraries:

  • Boost.Any
  • Boost.Assign
  • Boost.Utility
  • Boost.Ptr_container
  • Boost.Lexical_cast
  • Boost.Algorithm
  • Boost.Bind
  • Boost.Foreach
  • Boost.Asio
  • Boost.Smart_ptr
  • Boost.Function
  • Boost.Filesystem
  • Boost.System
Full list of Boost C++ libraries see there.

All used libraries are header-only, except Boost.Filesystem and Boost.System, so you must build these libraries and link it with your program.

However, if you using C++ professionally, you (in my humble opinion) must have Boost C++ libraries. So just download full package from there, install it and enjoy!

Note: If you use Windows - see http://www.boostpro.com/download.
